headline: Allstate survey: Nearly half of Canadian pets may be risking injury with unrestrained car travel
summary: Even though 84 per cent of dog and cat owners drive with their pets at least yearly, 47 per cent still don’t take the crucial step of restraining them for safetyMARKHAM, Ontario, Aug. 11, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- With Labour Day weekend fast approaching, many pet owners are gearing up for one last summer road trip. Allstate Insurance Company of Canada (“Allstate”) is launching a campaign to encourage Canadians to reconsider how they travel with their furry family members and prioritize their saf
